title: Pes 2nd round doubt
content:
Hi
My pessat rank 580. I could not attend the first round due to jee advanced exam. Now I want to take cse in RR campus by attending second round. What is the chance?

comments.body: Decent chances. Attend the second round and hope the number of rankers which turn up with ranks higher than yours aren't more than 20.
I got 4.9k ;-; and wot can I get ;-;
I got 2.6k rank and secured cse in EC campus, is it a safe bet for me to surrender my seat and attend 2nd round??
